title: How to Bake Traditional Honey Wheat Bread

steps.headline: Mix warm water with yeast and sugar.
Mix milk, water, 2 cups of flour, honey, butter and shortening.
Mix in yeast mixture and remaining 3 cups of flour.
Butter a medium sized baking pan.
Take out the baked bread, butter it and let stand until it cools down.

text: Gather your ingredients together.  Mix warm water with yeast and sugar. Let stand. Preheat oven to 350 degrees.  Mix milk, water, 2 cups of flour, honey, butter and shortening. Let stand 10 minutes. Mix in yeast mixture and remaining 3 cups of flour. Let stand 15 minutes. Butter a medium sized baking pan.  Spoon dough into pan.  Put in oven for 50 minutes.  Take out the baked bread, butter it and let stand until it cools down.  Enjoy!
